scripts.deploy: export NO_D1_WARNING=true NO_CONSTELLATION_WARNING=true && wrangler deploy src/worker.ts
scripts.start: export NO_D1_WARNING=true NO_CONSTELLATION_WARNING=true && wrangler dev src/worker.ts
scripts.fresh: export NO_D1_WARNING=true NO_CONSTELLATION_WARNING=true && wrangler d1 execute dev-db-classes --file=./schema.sql --local && npm start
